game.suite

Class ChessBishop

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.suite.ChessPiece
      • game.suite.ChessBishop

  • public class ChessBishop
extends ChessPiece
    Subclass of a Piece specific to a Bishop. This handles all movements the bishop is capable of making.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChessBishop(int initX, int initY, ChessBoard.Color color, ChessStandardBoard board)
      Bishop constructor initializes name of piece to Bishop.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static boolean isValidBishopMove(int xDisplacement, int yDisplacement)
      Checks if the move is a valid Bishop move.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChessBishop

        public ChessBishop(int initX,
                   int initY,
                   ChessBoard.Color color,
                   ChessStandardBoard board)
        Bishop constructor initializes name of piece to Bishop. Every other parameter is initialized by superclass.
        Parameters:
        initX - x location of the bishop
        initY - y location of the bishop
        color - color of the bishop
        board - current game board

    • Method Detail

      • isValidBishopMove

        public static boolean isValidBishopMove(int xDisplacement,
                                        int yDisplacement)
        Checks if the move is a valid Bishop move.
        Parameters:
        xDisplacement - change in x from the move
        yDisplacement - change in y from the move
        Returns:
        true if the move is a valid Bishop move
